definition[0]: if children act up, they behave badly

definition[1]: if a machine or part of your body acts up, it does not work properly
example[1]: The computer is acting up again.
definition[2]: an organization in the US and the UK that demands more help and support for people with AIDS. It is known for its strong active protests against companies or government departments if they treat people with AIDS unfairly. It is also known as the AIDS Coalition to Unleash Power.
